skins.selfIntroduction: I am the battlecruiser Renown, and I was training in Govan before coming here! Being able to weigh anchor ahead of schedule is a testament to my strength... Indeed! I will do my utmost to live up to everyone's expectations!
skins.acquisition: The Renown-class battlecruiser Renown has come to join your ranks! My stature may be small, but my desire to succeed is great!
skins.login: Commander, Renown is awaiting your orders! Please issue today's commands!
skins.details: There are many things that I do not understand in the Codex of the Royal Knights! Commander, can you offer me any guidance?
skins.secretaryIdle1: As long as Renown is here, no harm shall befall you, Commander!
skins.secretaryIdle2: The serious and dedicated Little Renown is cute? I see, I'll be sure to pass on the message to... wait, what?
skins.secretaryIdle3: It's not just you. Everyone here at port is truly amazing... I must redouble my efforts...!
skins.secretaryTouch: Candy? I'll have you know, Commander... Renown has no use for such things!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander! That's in violation of Royal etiquette!
